Name: Disciple
Actions: Mace. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage. Sacred Flame (Cantrip). You target one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw or take 4 (1d8) radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw. Spellcasting. You cast one the following cleric spells (spell save DC 11), using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:At will: guidance2/day: cure wounds
